mapper.insert: insert into items(name, price, description, parent_id, field) values(#{name}, #{price}, #{description}, #{parentId}, #{field})
mapper.update: update items set name=#{name}, price=#{price}, description=#{description} where item_no = #{itemNo}
mapper.select: select * from items where parent_id = #{parentId} or parent_id=0
